name: Osmos Sports Center [Demo]
description:
Welcome to the Osmos Sports Center!

Returning home from college for a semester, your childhood friend Jerry calls to ask if you want a job at the Osmos Sports Center; a recreational building dedicated to teaching others about the importance of physical activity.

Over time, you will make friends, find love... and uncover the mysterious beginnings of the Osmos Sports Center itself. Where will your path lead you?

Features

- In this free to play demo, you will meet characters who work in different departments of the Osmos Sports Center.

-Two playable avatars to choose from.

-Original Demo Soundtrack featuring seven new songs.

-Partial voice acting included.
